mapper.select: select emp_id, emp_name, dept_name from employee join department using(dept_code) where emp_id = #{empId} and emp_status = 'Y'
select dept_code, dept_name from department order by dept_code

select emp_id, emp_name, e.dept_code, dept_name, e.job_code, job_name from employee e join department d on(e.dept_code = d.dept_code) join job j on(e.job_code = j.job_code) where emp_status = 'Y' order by e.dept_code, e.job_code

select emp_id, emp_name, e.dept_code, dept_name, e.job_code, job_name from employee e join department d on(e.dept_code = d.dept_code) join job j on(e.job_code = j.job_code) where emp_status = 'Y'
and dept_name like '%' || #{deptName} || '%' order by job_code
and job_name like '%' || #{jobName} || '%' order by dept_code
and emp_name like '%' || #{empName} || '%' order by dept_code, job_code
mapper.insert: insert into approve_line values(#{approverEmpid}, #{docNo}, #{approveStep}, #{approveReject}, #{approveStatus}, null, null)
mapper.select: select line_name from frequent_approval_line where emp_id = #{empId} group by line_name order by line_name

select f.line_name, f.emp_id, f.authorized_empid, e.emp_name, j.job_name, d.dept_name, f.approve_step from frequent_approval_line f join employee e on(f.authorized_empid = e.emp_id) join department d on(e.dept_code = d.dept_code) join job j on(e.job_code = j.job_code) where f.emp_id = #{empId} and f.line_name = #{lineName} order by f.approve_step
mapper.delete: delete from frequent_approval_line where emp_id = #{empId} and line_name = #{lineName}
mapper.select: select count(*) from (select v.doc_no from vacation v join approve_line a on(v.doc_no = a.doc_no) where a.approver_empid=#{empId} and a.approve_status=#{approveStatus} UNION ALL select f.doc_no from family_event f join approve_line a on(f.doc_no = a.doc_no) where a.approver_empid=#{empId} and a.approve_status=#{approveStatus} UNION ALL select p.doc_no from proof p join approve_line a on(p.doc_no = a.doc_no) where a.approver_empid=#{empId} and a.approve_status=#{approveStatus} UNION ALL select d.doc_no from draft d join approve_line a on(d.doc_no = a.doc_no) where a.approver_empid=#{empId} and a.approve_status=#{approveStatus})
